title: Hercules in New York
summary: Hercules (Schwarzenegger) is sent to Earth where he finds true love and starts a promising career in the bodybuilder business.
critic_reviews: For some reason, producer Wisberg decided to revive the long dead Hercules craze, and luckily it didn't take.

reviews.content: Awful film. I forgive Arnie as it was his first ever movie. But dear god its bad. The dialogue is shocking.
10 out of 10 would watch it againArnold is a strong man and bashing bears was the biggest laugh
